1.name: Star Wars
1.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

2.name: Suspiria
2.description: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

3.name: Annie Hall
3.description: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

4.name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
4.description: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

5.name: Saturday Night Fever
5.description: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19 year old Italian American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

6.name: A Bridge Too Far
6.description: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

7.name: Eraserhead
7.description: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

8.name: Smokey and the Bandit
8.description: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

9.name: Hausu
9.description: A schoolgirl and six of her classmates travel to her aunt's country home, which turns out to be haunted.

10.name: The Hills Have Eyes
10.description: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

11.name: New York, New York
11.description: An egotistical saxophonist and a young singer meet on V-J Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, up-hill climb.

12.name: The Spy Who Loved Me
12.description: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. Agent, whose lover he killed.

13.name: Slap Shot
13.description: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

14.name: Sorcerer
14.description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous South American jungle.

15.name: Exorcist II: The Heretic
15.description: A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.

16.name: Wizards
16.description: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

17.name: Pete's Dragon
17.description: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

18.name: Rabid
18.description: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after undergoing experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into rabid, blood-thirsty zombies who proceed to infect others, which turns into a city-wide epidemic.

19.name: The Kentucky Fried Movie
19.description: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

20.name: The Rescuers
20.description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

21.name: Orca
21.description: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

22.name: The Deep
22.description: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

23.name: The Gauntlet
23.description: A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.

24.name: The Sentinel
24.description: A young woman moves into an apartment in a building which houses a sinister evil.

25.name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
25.description: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.

26.name: Cross of Iron
26.description: German commander Captain Hauptmann Stransky (Maximilian Schell) places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner (James Coburn) refuses to lie for him.

27.name: The Car
27.description: A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

28.name: Emanuelle e gli ultimi cannibali
28.description: A female journalist decides to traverse the Amazon Jungle after going undercover in a mental asylum and witnessing a disturbing behavior from a rescued white woman, who she believes was raised by a cannibalistic tribe long thought extinct.

29.name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
29.description: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A. A. Milne.

30.name: The Duellists
30.description: A small feud between two Napoleonic officers evolves into a decades-long series of duels.

31.name: Rolling Thunder
31.description: A returning war veteran loses his family to a violent home invasion and decides to seek and retaliate against those responsible.

32.name: Demon Seed
32.description: A scientist creates Proteus--an organic super computer with artificial intelligence which becomes obsessed with human beings, and in particular the creators wife.

33.name: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
33.description: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively violent sexual encounters.

34.name: 3 Women
34.description: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other a mysterious teenager, share a bizarre relationship.

35.name: High Anxiety
35.description: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

36.name: Martin
36.description: A young man, who believes himself to be a vampire, goes to live with his elderly and hostile cousin in a small Pennsylvania town where he tries to redeem his blood-craving urges.

37.name: Maladolescenza
37.description: A teen boy grows from playing and fighting with his German-shepherd dog, to playing kids and adult games with two equally young girls, in a dream-like forest which eventually turns eerie, and somber.

38.name: Airport '77
38.description: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

39.name: Jabberwocky
39.description: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

40.name: Julia
40.description: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

41.name: The Goodbye Girl
41.description: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

42.name: Starship Invasions
42.description: An advance team from a dying, far-off civilization seeks a new world to conquer and inhabit -- Earth.

43.name: Damnation Alley
43.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors travel and find other settlements in huge custom designed all terrain vehicles.

44.name: Una giornata particolare
44.description: Two neighbors, a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife, meet during Hitler's visit to Italy in May 1938.

45.name: Der Ruf der blonden Göttin
45.description: Susan arrives in Haiti to live with her husband Jack, who lives with a lesbian housekeeper and Olga, a nymphomaniac platinum blonde, introduced to her as Jack's sister. Susan begins to have...                See full summary »

46.name: Semi-Tough
46.description: A three-way friendship between two free-spirited professional football players and the owner's daughter becomes compromised when two of them become romantically involved.

47.name: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
47.description: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

48.name: Cet obscur objet du désir
48.description: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

49.name: The Incredible Melting Man
49.description: An astronaut is transformed into a murderous gelatinous mass after returning from an ill-fated space voyage.

50.name: L'ultima orgia del III Reich
50.description: A Jewish WWII survivor revisits the ruins of a hellish concentration camp, and the memories are still vivid. How did she escape the humiliation, the tortures, and the destruction of human flesh? How did she flee from Gestapo's last orgy?
